sentence.Network_en: Gloatingly , Miss Su said,'she ate with Mr. Fang and came back with an upset stomach.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏小姐面有得色道: “ 她跟方先生吃饭回来害肚子.

sentence.Network_en: Captain Black yawned deliciously, rubbed the last lethargy from his eyes and laughed gloatingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 布莱克上尉很惬意地打了呵欠, 驱走了最后一丝睡意,幸灾乐祸地笑了起来.

sentence.Network_en: Then, hand in hand they made off, guffawing gloatingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后, 他们手挽着手, 哈哈大笑着回到了欧洲.

PerfectNetExp.abs: gloat 贪婪地看gloatingly 沾沾自喜地glob 一滴

sentences.sentence: "he spoke gloatingly about people he had cheated out of their money"
